scripts.lint: npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint
scripts.clean: npm run clean:buildinfo && npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:bin && npm run clean:rel
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:dist && npm run build:exe
scripts.build:sea: npm run build:sea:blob && npm run build:sea:cpnode && npm run build:sea:postject
scripts.build:sea:postject: npx postject bin/cluster-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB bin/sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod -w bin/cluster-linux
scripts.release: npm run tar && npm run zip
scripts.tar: npm run tar:linux && npm run tar:alpine && npm run tar:mac && npm run tar:win
scripts.tar:linux: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|cluster-linux|cluster|' -czvf rel/cluster-linux-x86.tar.gz cluster-linux
scripts.tar:alpine: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|cluster-alpine|cluster|' -czvf rel/cluster-alpine-x86.tar.gz cluster-alpine
scripts.tar:mac: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|cluster-macos|cluster|' -czvf rel/cluster-mac-x86.tar.gz cluster-macos
scripts.tar:win: mkdir -p rel && tar -C bin --transform 'flags=r;s|cluster-win|cluster|' -czvf rel/cluster-win-x86.tar.gz cluster-win.exe
scripts.zip: npm run zip:linux && npm run zip:alpine && npm run zip:mac && npm run zip:win
scripts.zip:linux:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/cluster-linux-x86.zip bin/cluster-linux -j bin && printf '@ cluster-linux
@=cluster
' | zipnote -w rel/cluster-linux-x86.zip
scripts.zip:alpine:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/cluster-alpine-x86.zip bin/cluster-alpine -j bin && printf '@ cluster-alpine
@=cluster
' | zipnote -w rel/cluster-alpine-x86.zip
scripts.zip:mac:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/cluster-mac-x86.zip bin/cluster-macos -j bin && printf '@ cluster-macos
@=cluster
' | zipnote -w rel/cluster-mac-x86.zip
scripts.zip:win:
mkdir -p rel && zip rel/cluster-win-x86.zip bin/cluster-win.exe -j bin && printf '@ cluster-win.exe
@=cluster.exe
' | zipnote -w rel/cluster-win-x86.zip
